pullRequest.title: Adding array transform functions: array_average, array_max, array_min, array_sum
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Per #6083, Adding array transform functions to operate on multi-value column, matching the behavior as Presto functions: https://prestodb.io/docs/current/functions/array.html
Functions added:
array_average
array_max
array_min
array_sum

nodes.bodyText: Remove the underscore so that it works for both arrayAverage and array_average?
I think we can always return doubles for this function to keep the consistent behavior between aggregation and transform.
For INT, use _argument.transformToIntValuesMV(projectionBlock) for better performance (avoid extra casting). Same for FLOAT
(nit) Move the declaration into the for look for better readability
(nit) Cache intValuesMV[i].length, same for other places

commit.message: Adding array transform functions: array_average, array_max, array_min, array_sum
